header-text.zh: 正在打开的项目使用了您尚未安装的第三方插件，请先尝试安装下列的插件、行为或滤镜，再重新打开项目。
header-text.en: The project you are opening uses the following addons that are not installed. Try installing these missing plugins, behaviors and effects and then re-open the project.

c2-runtime-compatibility-note.zh: [b]注意：[/b]此项目使用了历史遗留的 C2 runtime，已在最新版中移除，不再受到支持。但你仍然可以访问 [a1]Construct 3 r251.2[/a1] 版本，这是历史支持 C2 runtime 的最后一个版本，通过此版本您可以将项目升级到 C3 runtime，并另存为新文件，即可使用最新版本打开。[a2]点击此处，了解更多[/a2]。
c2-runtime-compatibility-note.en: [b]Note:[/b] this project uses the legacy C2 runtime, which has since been removed from Construct 3. You can also try importing the project to C3 [a1]r251.2[/a1], which is the last release that included the C2 runtime. Then you can upgrade it to the C3 runtime and import it to the latest release. [a2]Learn more[/a2]

sdk-v1-note.zh: [b]注意[/b]，当前版本不再支持 SDK V1 插件。若您仍然需要使用旧版本的插件，可前往最后一个支持的正式版本 [b]r449[/b] LTS 版本。请查看 [a1]LTS 发布页面[/a1]，或尝试联系插件开发者，获取插件的最新版本。
sdk-v1-note.en: [b]Note:[/b] legacy (SDK v1) addons are no longer supported in this release of Construct and so cannot be installed. The last release that supports legacy addons is the [b]r449[/b] LTS release. See the [a1]LTS releases page[/a1], or contact the addon developer for an updated version of the addon.
